short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jot down important stuff on the go!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
StickyTabs is a versatile Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by providing an instant note-taking feature and a growing collection of beautiful wallpapers. With StickyTabs, you can take quick notes simply by opening a new tab, ensuring that your important thoughts and tasks are always just a click away.
